column1: Where do you think you're going?
Then get in the "Official Presidents of the Terrance and Phillip Fan Club" line.
You and about a thousand other people at one time or another. Now, get out of my face!
Whoa whoa, what the hell are you kids doin' in here? This isn't an appropriate place for children
Hey Gino, these kids say they know you.
I didn't think so. All right, you kids-
